item.title: GOP senator to propose ban on gender transition treatment for minors
item.description: Republican Sen. Roger Marshall is introducing a bill, shared exclusively with Fox News Digital, to prevent gender-related medical treatment on minors.

item.title: Supreme Court to weigh state ban on transgender 'medical treatments' for minors

item.title: Democratic challenger Adam Gray flips California's 13th Congressional District in nation's final House race
item.description: Democrat Adam Gray has won California's 13th Congressional District race, defeating incumbent Republican Rep. John Duarte.
